snippet: A day after forfeiting his dual Canadian citizenship, Senator Ted Cruz held a rally to gin up support for his effort to defund President Obama’s health care overhaul.
abstract: Republican Sen Ted Cruz of Texas, one day after forfeiting his dual Canadian citizenship, holds rally to gain support for effort to defund Pres Obama's health care overhaul.

byline.original: By ASHLEY PARKER and JONATHAN MARTIN
byline.contributor: Ashley Parker reported from Dallas, and Jonathan Martin from Washington.

lead_paragraph: A day after forfeiting his dual Canadian citizenship, Senator Ted Cruz held a rally to gin up support for his effort to defund President Obama’s health care overhaul.

headline.main: Amid Talk of White House Run, Texas Senator Targets Obama’s Health Plan
headline.print_headline: Amid Talk of White House Run, Texas Senator Targets Obama’s Health Plan

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
